description: a(n) = n times sum of digits of n.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: for n from 0 to 150 do printf(`%d,`,n*add(convert(n, base, 10)[i], i=1..nops(convert(n,base, 10)))) od:
prog: (Haskell)a057147 n = a007953 n * n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 19 2014(PARI) a(n) = n*sumdigits(n) \\ _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Aug 03 2014(Python)[n*sum([int(d) for d in str(n)]) for n in range(10**5)] # _Chai Wah Wu_, Aug 05 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 13 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_ and Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Sep 13 2000
